Summary: ESR1 activates UGT1A4.
ESR1 activates UGT2B7.
NR1I3 activates UGT2B7.
ESR1 activates UGT1A3.
NR1I3 activates UGT1A4.
NR1I3 activates UGT1A3.
NR1I2 activates UGT2B7.
NR1I2 activates UGT1A4.
NR1I2 activates UGT1A3.
Biochemical reaction from lamotrigine to lamotrigine 2-n-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B7, UGT1A4 or UGT1A3.
Biochemical reaction from lamotrigine to N2-methyl lamotrigine.
Biochemical reaction from lamotrigine to lamotrigine-arene-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2A6 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from lamotrigine to lamotrigine n2-oxide.
Biochemical reaction from lamotrigine-arene-oxide to lamotrigine glutathione adduct.
Biochemical reaction from lamotrigine to lamotrigine 5-n-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3, UGT1A4 or UGT2B7.
lamotrigine inhibits SCN.
lamotrigine inhibits CACNA1.
Transport from lamotrigine to lamotrigine. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
Transport from lamotrigine glutathione adduct to lamotrigine glutathione adduct. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCC1.
Transport from N2-methyl lamotrigine to N2-methyl lamotrigine. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC3 or ABCC4.
Transport from lamotrigine n2-oxide to lamotrigine n2-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC4 or ABCC3.
Transport from lamotrigine to lamotrigine. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
Transport from lamotrigine 2-n-glucuronide to lamotrigine 2-n-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2, ABCC4 or ABCC3.
Transport from lamotrigine to lamotrigine.
Transport from lamotrigine 5-n-glucuronide to lamotrigine 5-n-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC4, ABCC2 or ABCC3.
Transport from lamotrigine to lamotrigine. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1, ABCC2 or ABCG2.
